thread.title: Kuwait's Al Ahli gets Egyptian nod for Piraeus Bank deal
thread.title_full: Kuwait's Al Ahli gets Egyptian nod for Piraeus Bank deal

title: Kuwait's Al Ahli gets Egyptian nod for Piraeus Bank deal
text:
Thursday, 20 August 2015 2:05 PM 
Al Ahli Bank 
Kuwait's Al Ahli Bank received approval from the Egyptian Financial Supervisory Authority (EFSA) to acquire a controlling stake in Piraeus Bank's Egypt unit, it said on Thursday. 
Al Ahli, Kuwait's seventh largest bank by assets, plans to pay $150 million in cash for a 98.5 percent shareholding in the Greek lender's Egyptian unit. 
The EFSA approved the deal on August 19, the lender said. Al Ahli has also obtained regulatory approvals from the Egyptian and Kuwaiti central banks.
